description: Radon is a Python tool that computes various code metrics from source code.

options.name: --help
options.description: show this help message and exit

options.name: --version
options.description: show program's version number and exit

cc.description: Analyze the given Python modules and compute Cyclomatic Complexity (CC).

raw.description: Analyze the given Python modules and compute raw metrics.

mi.description: Analyze the given Python modules and compute the Maintainability Index.

hal.description: Analyze the given Python modules and compute their Halstead metrics.
